name: unrecorded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not written about before, and therefore not known about: Patterson discovered the previously unrecorded animal in 1999.
(of sounds or moving pictures) not recorded on electronic equipment: The singer told fans he had a new unrecorded song to try out on them.
